attributes.action: Printing Patel should apologize for offering aid to Israeli Army
attributes.background: Priti Patel has held secret unauthorised meetings in Israel to offer British Govt Aid to the Israeli Army to continue its brutal occupation and subjugation of Palestinian people, this is an affront to UK and to the sensibilities of taxpayers.

rejection.details: As you may know, Priti Patel is no longer a member of the UK Government.
